Testing VPADDUSW instruction
==========================
Test 1: Basic functionality
Operand A: 1000 2000 3000 4000 5000 6000 7000 8000 
Operand B: 500 1000 1500 2000 2500 3000 3500 4000 
Result: 1500 3000 4500 6000 7500 9000 10500 12000 
[PASS]

Test 2: Saturation cases
Operand A: 60000 62000 64000 65000 0 10000 20000 30000 
Operand B: 6000 4000 2000 1000 65535 55535 45535 35535 
Result: 65535 65535 65535 65535 65535 65535 65535 65535 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX
Operand A: 1000 2000 3000 4000 5000 6000 7000 8000 9000 10000 11000 12000 13000 14000 15000 16000 
Operand B: 500 1000 1500 2000 2500 3000 3500 4000 4500 5000 5500 6000 6500 7000 7500 8000 
Result: 1500 3000 4500 6000 7500 9000 10500 12000 13500 15000 16500 18000 19500 21000 22500 24000 
[PASS]

VPADDUSW tests completed.
